short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a 'Quoopy' option to the context menu in Slack to quote highlighted text.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Elevate your Slack conversations with Quoopy - the quickest way to quote and reply!
